short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Randomly re-arrange interior letters in words

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension rearranges the interior letters of words causing those words to be scrambled but still readable. Use this extension to improve your speed reading skills, help others understand what it's like to have symbolic dyslexia, or simply to annoy your co-workers!

This extension has options for effect speed, effect amount, as well as an on/off switch.
